title: Does my phone come with a headset? What line order does my phone support?
answer:
The headset coming with your phone adopts the American line order, which is the mainstream line order in the industry. 

 [The headset comes with only one button (the hook button) for you to answer or end a call as well as start or stop playing music. Your phone supports other headsets with volume up and volume down buttons. Using such headsets, you can also adjust the call volume and music volume.]()
